job_title: Student Manager in Mount Vernon, IA
pros: As a student manager for the admissions department, I had to juggle many different things, including organizing the shifts, emailing callers, calling prospective students and other things. Being able to have a flexible shift was very excellent, and being able to openly communicate with the employers, workers and other student managers was a great plus. It was a relaxed work environment, and it's easy to make more friends by working with other students that have a wide variety of interests. Being able to talk to prospective students with  the same interests was also fun to do.
cons: Sometimes, trying to juggle homework and working was difficult. Additionally, trying to meet certain deadlines was not impossible, but very difficult for both student callers and for the other student managers. Many times during phone calls, we would get hung up on or yelled at parents. Sometimes, not everybody was available for some reason or another, and I would have to come in many times by myself to finish up stats and data entry.
